title: Before Detroit Can Move On, It Needs To Upgrade From Windows XP FiveThirtyEight » Features | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: One week into her new job as Detroit’s chief information officer, Beth Niblock had to deal with a pressing issue she probably hadn’t anticipated.
